overview:
A serial entrepreneur, a business invention and strategic leader, managing and leading new initiatives from inception to implementation and significant sales.

He is the founder, CEO and Board member of VascoDe Technologies which is the best solution available in the market enabling simple-phone users to enjoy advanced applications, such as Gmail, Facebook, twitter, visual voice mail, Wikipedia, mobile Skype and others (no need to install software on mobile device, no need for data connection). He has vast knowledge of both the telecom technologies and the global markets; working with startup and mature companies in the communication market including PBX vendors, mobile operators, and Telco vendors (i.e. Amdocs, Comverse, Tadiran); and founded several startups; one of them (Osmio, a NY based company) was acquired by a strategic partner.
